Today in the North East, it's looking good with 3 ft @ 5s E swell and 12 mph ENE winds. Saltburn Beach and Coatham Sands are prime spots, both working well from 08:26 to 15:42. Tomorrow, the swell drops to 1 ft @ 5s E with fresh 15 mph NNE winds, making it a quiet day. By the day after, the swell picks back up to 4 ft @ 7s NE, with better conditions at Saltburn Beach and nearby spots. Best: today.
